subtasks.description: Test Course Instructor Workflow - checking overall course performance
Test Student Progress Investigation - identifying struggling students
Test Analytics Question Workflow - natural language data queries
Test Comparative Analysis Workflow - comparing lesson performance
Test Data Export Workflow - exporting data for external analysis

validation_criteria: Course instructor can assess course performance
Can export data for external analysis

agent_handoff.handoff_reason: Validate real-world business scenarios after critical fixes

scenario_1_course_instructor.name: Course Instructor Workflow
scenario_1_course_instructor.business_case: Instructor needs to check overall course performance

scenario_2_student_investigation.name: Student Progress Investigation
scenario_2_student_investigation.business_case: Instructor needs to identify struggling students

scenario_4_comparative_analysis.name: Comparative Analysis Workflow
scenario_4_comparative_analysis.business_case: Instructor compares performance between different lessons
